TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageHeaderAttribute extends System.ServiceModel.MessageContractMemberAttribute

summary.span: 指定数据成员为 SOAP 消息头。

span.span: Specifies that a data member is a SOAP message header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性允许您将用 特性标记的类型的字段和属性映射到 SOAP 消息头。The attribute allows you to map fields and properties of a type marked with the attribute to SOAP message headers. 该字段或属性可以是简单类型，也可以是可序列化的复合类型。The field or property can be of a simple type or a composite type that can be serialized. 有关在不修改默认 SOAP 信封本身的情况下控制 SOAP 正文内容序列化的信息，请参阅 [在服务协定中指定数据传输](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts)和 [使用数据协定](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts)。For information on controlling the serialization of the contents of a SOAP body without modifying the default SOAP envelope itself, see , [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts), and [Using Data Contracts](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts). 有关创建消息协定的详细信息，请参阅 [使用消息协定](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts)。For more information about creating message contracts, see [Using Message Contracts](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts). SOAP 标准定义下列可在标头中存在的属性：The SOAP standard defines the following attributes that can exist on a header: - `Actor` 或 `Role`（SOAP 1.1 中为 `Actor`，SOAP 1.2 中为 `Role`）。`Actor` or `Role` (`Actor` in SOAP 1.1, `Role` in SOAP 1.2) - `MustUnderstand` - `Relay` `Actor` 或 `Role` 属性指定需要给定标头的节点 URI。The `Actor` or `Role` attribute specifies the URI of the node for which a given header is intended. `MustUnderstand` 属性指定标头是否理解节点的处理。The `MustUnderstand` attribute specifies whether the header understands the node processing. `Relay` 特性指定标头是否要中继到下游节点。The `Relay` attribute specifies whether the header is to be relayed to downstream nodes. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 不会对传入消息执行这些特性的任何处理， `MustUnderstand` 属性除外。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) does not perform any processing of these attributes on incoming messages, except for the `MustUnderstand` attribute. 但是，即使默认情况下不发送这些属性，您也可以对它们进行读写。You can, however, read and write these attributes, even though they are not sent by default. 可以通过以下两种方式设置特性值。You can set the attribute values in two ways. 首先，可以在 中更改 、 和 属性。First, you can change the , and properties on the . (没有 `Role` 属性设置 属性，并且 `Role` 如果使用 SOAP 1.2) ，则传递。(There is no `Role` property - set the property and `Role` is passed if SOAP 1.2 is used). 例如：For example: 控制这些属性的第二种方式是将所需标头类型设为 类的类型参数，然后将生成的类型与 一起使用。The second way to control these attributes is by making the desired header type the type parameter of the class and using the resulting type together with the . 然后，再以编程方式使用 属性设置这些 SOAP 特性。Then use the properties programmatically to set the SOAP attributes. 例如：For example: 如果同时使用了动态和静态控制机制，则静态设置为默认值，但可以使用动态机制重写。If both the dynamic and the static control mechanisms are used, the static settings are the default but can be overridden using the dynamic mechanism. 例如：For example: 允许使用动态属性控件创建重复的标头。Creating repeated headers with dynamic attribute control is allowed. 例如：For example: ``` [MessageHeaderArray] public MessageHeader documentApprovers[]; ``` 在接收端，仅当使用泛型 类时才能读取这些 SOAP 属性。On the receiving side, reading these SOAP attributes can only be done if the generic class is used. 检查 类型标头的 、 或 属性以发现已接收消息的属性设置。Examine the , or properties of a header of the type to discover the attribute settings on the received message. 如果在接收一条消息后又发送回发送方，则仅对 类型的标头往返 SOAP 属性设置。When a message is received and then sent back, the SOAP attribute settings only roundtrip for headers of the type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 创建响应消息的 SOAP 标头，其中 、 和 属性设置为适合于此标头的值。The following code example shows the use of the to create a SOAP header for the response message with the , and properties set to values appropriate for this header. 此代码示例之后的示例为发送时的消息示例。The code example is followed by an example of the message when sent. [!code-csharp[MessageHeaderAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/cs/services.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MessageHeaderAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/vb/services.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示此标头为目标的节点的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets a URI that indicates the node at which this header is targeted.

summary.span: 使用 SOAP 1.2 时映射到角色标头属性，而使用 SOAP 1.1 时则映射到参与者标头属性。

span.span: Maps to the role header attribute when SOAP 1.2 is used and the actor header attribute when SOAP 1.1 is used.

value.span: 一个指示此标头为目标的节点的 URI。

span.span: A URI that indicates the node at which this header is targeted.

value.span: 使用 SOAP 1.2 时此 URI 映射到角色标头属性，而使用 SOAP 1.1 时则映射到参与者标头属性。

span.span: This URI maps to the role header attribute when SOAP 1.2 is used and the actor header attribute when SOAP 1.1 is used.

summary.span: 指定在 角色中起作用的节点是否必须理解此标头。

span.span: Specifies whether the node acting in the role must understand this header.

summary.span: 这将映射到 SOAP 标头属性。

span.span: This is mapped to the SOAP header attribute.

value.span: 如果在 角色中起作用的节点必须理解此标头，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the node acting in the role must understand this header; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关更多信息，请参见 的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of for details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 请记住，如果要发送的消息的 属性为 `true`，而接收端上的应用程序不理解标头，则将生成错误，这一点很重要。It is important to remember that if the property is `true` in a message being sent and the application on the receiving side does not understand the header a fault is generated. 相反，如果 `mustUnderstand` (WCF) Windows Communication Foundation 收到 SOAP 标头特性设置为的标头 `true` ，则该标头必须是消息协定的一部分 (，或者必须通过 WINDOWS COMMUNICATION FOUNDATION (WCF) 通道之一进行处理) ; 否则，将假定标头不被理解并引发异常。Conversely, if a header with the `mustUnderstand` SOAP header attribute set to `true` is received by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), it must be a part of the message contract (or must be processed by one of the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) channels); otherwise, it is assumed that the header is not understood and an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 创建响应消息的 SOAP 标头，其中 、 和 属性设置为适合于此标头的值。The following code example shows the use of the to create a SOAP header for the response message with the , and properties set to values appropriate for this header. 此代码示例之后的示例为发送时的消息示例。The code example is followed by an example of the message when sent. [!code-csharp[MessageHeaderAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/cs/services.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MessageHeaderAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/vb/services.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 SOAP 1.1 时，将忽略此属性。This property is ignored when SOAP 1.1 is used. 有关更多信息，请参见 的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of for details.
